```{r}
Mode <- function(x) {
  ux <- unique(x)
  ux[which.max(tabulate(match(x, ux)))]
}

mean(mtcars$mpg)
sd(mtcars$mpg)
var(mtcars$mpg)
median(mtcars$mpg)
Mode(mtcars$mpg)
min(mtcars$mpg)
max(mtcars$mpg)
quantile(mtcars$mpg)
kurtosis(mtcars$mpg)
skewness(mtcars$mpg)
```

```{r}
set.seed(123)
randomvecs<-function(N){
 x1=rnorm(N); x2=rnorm(N); x3=rnorm(N)
 return(data.frame(Va=x1,Vb=x1+x2,Vc=x1+x2+x3))
}

df<-randomvecs(20)
cov(df)
sapply(df,sd)
```
